thig3.3:0.3_0: and the supreme Mother came forth.
thig3.3:1.4_0: as it was taught by the Buddha.
thig3.3:2.1_0: I attain the meditations on emptiness
thig3.3:2.3_0: I am the Buddha’s rightful daughter,
thig3.3:3.1_0: All sensual pleasures are cut off,
thig3.3:3.4_0: Now there is no further existence.”
